mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (question_type, question_content, question_image, question_description, answer_id, question_topic) VALUES (#{questionType}, #{questionContent}, #{questionImage}, #{questionDescription}, #{answerId}, #{questionTopic})

INSERT INTO question (question_type, question_content, question_image, question_description, answer_id, question_topic) VALUES
(#{item.questionType}, #{item.questionContent}, #{item.questionImage}, #{item.questionDescription}, #{item.answerId}, #{item.questionTopic})
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET question_type = #{questionType}, question_content = #{questionContent}, question_image = #{questionImage}, question_description = #{questionDescription}, answer_id = #{questionAnswer}, question_topic = #{questionTopic} WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT question_id, question_type, question_content, question_image, question_description, answer_id, question_topic FROM question WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
SELECT question_id, question_type, question_content, question_image, question_description, answer_id, question_topic FROM question WHERE question_topic = #{topicName}
SELECT question_id, question_type, question_content, question_image, question_description, answer_id, question_topic FROM question

SELECT q.question_id, q.question_type, q.question_content, q.question_image, q.question_description, q.question_topic, a.answer_id, a.answer_content, a.answer_image, a.question_id FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer a ON q.answer_id = a.answer_id WHERE q.question_id = #{questionId}

SELECT q.question_id, q.question_type, q.question_content, q.question_image, q.question_description, q.question_topic, a.answer_id, a.answer_content, a.answer_image, a.question_id FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer a ON q.answer_id = a.answer_id

SELECT q.question_id, q.question_type, q.question_content, q.question_image, q.question_description, q.question_topic, a.answer_id, a.answer_content, a.answer_image, a.question_id FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer a ON q.answer_id = a.answer_id WHERE q.question_content LIKE '%${fuzzy}%'
